summary: A small size player house with a pool, fantastic views and your own "Spiced Wine" factory...
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Palatino Linotype][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#9bbb59][size=6][b]Reachwind Eyrie Manor[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[/font][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/5182375-1408037281.jpg[/img][/center][center]
Reachwind Eyrie Manor is a small player house located in the top of a hill in "The Reach" with a fantastic view, a pool and the privacy of a balcony. 
The house was inhabited by a boy who has been orphaned by the war and the wine business has been discontinued, but a new owner could continue with the old owner lucrative trade. There are two keys of the house; one is in the terrace patio (just look arround the wall mounted sabre cat head) and the other one is in the key peg holder beside the main door inside of the house. You can jump across the fence wall or lockpick the fence gates; you decide... I'm a Spanish speaker user so, some names in the mod are in spanish; if anyone want to traslate them is free to do so... The house is located heading south of Markath, in the seame hill of the Reach Wind Eyrie; I have added a map maker for fast travel. [/center]

[font=Palatino Linotype][color=#c0504d][size=5][b]Features[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[list][*][size=2]Smithy area[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Kitchen[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]WC[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Alchemy and Enchanting workbench[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Multiple Weapon racks in the house[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]There is an Armory room in the house with some mannequins, weapon rack plaques and display cases[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Master Bedroom with Secret Treasure Room and a balcony[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Follower Room[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Your own winery[/size][/*]
[*]A large pool with fantastic views of "the reach"[/*]
[/list][size=2]

[/size][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#c0504d][size=5][b]Requeriments
[/b][/size][/color][/font]You need the last version of skyrim and all the DLCs (Dawnguard, HearthFire & Dragonborn)

[font=Palatino Linotype][color=#c0504d][size=5][b]Installation
[/b][/size][/color][/font]Use Nexus Mod manager or manually copy the files inside your Skyrim "Data" folder and active the 01RenenianHouse.esp 
-Uninstall: Just desactive the 01RenenianHouse.esp from your active files

[font=Palatino Linotype][color=#c0504d][size=5][b]Bugs and Issues
[/b][/size][/color][/font]-I notice that some weapon racks don't put the weapons in the right place; I'm not sure why this happens so, If you know how to fix this feel free to do it...
-The "tempar robes" is an armor that is still in working progress so the meshes of the helmet and the boots are missing for now, if you use them you will experiment some extrange bugs like missing head or foots... A little funny thing :D 

[font=Palatino Linotype][color=#c0504d][size=5][b]Credits
[/b][/size][/color][/font]-Darkfox 127 for the amazing tutorial series
-Rajti15 for the house mesh
-Eldiabs for some of the activators like mannequins and weapon plaques
-Jet4571 for some of the clutter designs
-All modders who had created multiple versions of "Proudspire Mansion" For the inspiration
-"San's" for his wine :D
author: Sir Alethz
